wordpressPage.title: Jelly Slurp and Spit
wordpressPage.content:
Have a huge bowl of Jello up front, 3  students, and 3 small jars.  Each student gets a straw.  The
object is to see which student can get the most Jello into their personal jar by slurping it out of the
mother bowl and spitting it into their jar.  Give them a certain amount of time, then compare jars
to see who has the most
